tool_description: An API with a variety of great information/sources of mushrooms.
title: Mushrooms Live

api_list.name: Receive Particular Info From Various Websites
api_list.description: Get different information/articles/research about mushrooms from specific websites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mushrooms-live2.p.rapidapi.com/info/{websiteid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mushrooms-live2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Mushroom Information/Research
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back all you want to know about mushrooms!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mushrooms-live2.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mushrooms-live2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
